awd_titl_txt: Urban Systemic Initiative/City of El Paso
awd_abstract_narration: 9350138  Navarro    The El Paso USI will be implemented through the El Paso  Collaborative for Academic Excellence, an organization of school  district superintendents, university officials, civic leaders and  the mayor. The Collaborative will focus on three areas:  establishing community consensus on a set of competencies;   determining current policies and practices that affect mathematics  and science; developing comprehensive plans for change that build  upon district strengths. Upon completion of the self study, the El  Paso USI will continue with the development of a comprehensive plan  for change for the district that will build on identified strengths  and focus attention on areas of greatest need.    The University of Texas at El Paso will house the Collaborative and  provide leadership over USI activities.     The award period is for 12 months.  ***
